title: Woman fuming at bridesmaid and photographer after looking through wedding snaps
text:

Planning a wedding is serious business and pulling everything together seamlessly can feel like a near impossible task.

From the venues, to caterers, to music, you live in constant fear that one of the people you rely on most will heartlessly betray you during your moment of need.

Having made it through the day, you can look around at your drunken friends and family on the dancefloor knowing the stress was all worth it and you'll forever be able to look back on the treasured photos with pride.

However, it was long after the dust had settled on the big day that all it all came crashing down for one bride, leaving her furious at both her bridesmaid and photographer.

(Image: Getty Images/iStockphoto)

(Image: Getty Images/Vetta)

Writing in a post on Mumsnet , she explains that she tied the knot a couple of months ago with a 'smallish affair on a small budget' as the couple didn't believe in splashing a fortune on the wedding.

The photographer was new to the profession but demonstrated to the bride an ability to take great photos, so they agreed a small package of 300 digital pictures and an album.

When the photos returned, the couple sat down to relive their special day together.

After a few of the usual snaps they came to a nice picture of one of her dear bridesmaid and her family. Then another. And another. Until they scrolled through all 43 frames from the exclusive photoshoot.

(Image: Getty Images)

A huge chunk of their precious 300 photos were gone. To make matters worse, they had been taken in a location far from the reception, meaning the bridesmaid, her family and the photographer had sneaked away purposely to do them in private.

The unhappy newlywed finishes the post headed Am I Being Unreasonable? by saying her bridesmaid has just messaged her asking her to see the wedding pictures and she was yet to reply.

With everyone agreeing she is right to be livid, attention quickly turned to how she could get her own back.

One commented: "Oooh, you could have so much fun with this. Transfer all the pics onto another memory stick minus her 43. Go through them and play dumb. Watch her squirm!"

Others thought the photographer was the one in the wrong, suggesting she pays a reduced rate and advises them to chase the bridesmaid for the rest.

Whatever happens, we wouldn't swap places with either of them right now.
description: Her bridesmaid has messaged asking to see the photos and she's not sure what to reply
